Key Match Events: Belgium expected to win against Slovakia
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium, led by Kevin De Bruyne and Romelu Lukaku, are favorites under manager Domenico Tedesco; Slovakia relies on defense and players like Milan Škriniar and Marek Hamšík; the match is predicted to be a comfortable win for Belgium
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is significant as it is the opening game for both teams in Group E
Others: Belgium vs Slovakia takes place on June 17, 2024, at 18:00 CET in Frankfurt
